data.title: JOURNEY 2 THE MYSTERIOUS ISLAND
data.meta_description: motion picture |   Feature film (over 60 minutes).   "What a wonderful world" by George David Weiss, Robert Thiele, performed by Dwayne Johnson. (Songs).   Recorded on 14th October 2011 at Angel Studios 1, London.   Inc: Steve Mair, acoustic double bass; Ralph Salmins, drums; (pre-recorded) Luis Conte, bongos, shaker. (Soundtrack Personnel).   Motion Picture (Form).
